title: this is kind of funny.
content:
Laurel Broten, Ontario Minister is the Environment.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017203259im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LaurelBroten_4173.jpg)

the logo behind her is from here: [http://www.flickoff.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017203259/http:/www.flickoff.org/ "http://www.flickoff.org/")

The double entendre of the works almost too well. :o)

author: russellm
